Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ATP
Reviews.Content: We take sports photos (football). this camera is great!! it takes great action photos. the 55-300 lens is great to get close up shots from half way across the field. the 18-55 lens takes very nice close ups. the 32GB card gives me 6 thousand pics at a setting of fine/ large jpg files that is about 4mb per pic. even though you can get everything in the bag it is too small and it will be the first thing that i replace.  the wide angle add on lense does work but i have not had much time to work with it. however the 2x telephoto add on lense hooked to the 55-300 lens makes the camera unable to auto focus and even on manual pics are foggy. All other items in this kit work like i would expect them too.  all in all i love the camera and the two nikon lenses. I would suggest the d5100 and the two nikon lenses to anyone who wants a good nikon

Reviews.Title: Great Nikon D5100 Bundle!!
Reviews.Author: pinkish
Reviews.Content: We were going to buy D5100 w/ 18-55 & 55-300 lens in Walmart for $1,026.21 w/tax, in-store delivery in 7-14 days, then we found this bundle in Amazon w/ everything we needed for our new camera for $1,069.90, delivered to our door in 5 days!!!Every item in the bundle was tried and all work great: memory card in the camera, UV filters protecting lens, wide angle for landscape pics, wireless remote control to take family pic, fast memory card reader, nice cleaning kit, tripod was fun for the family, screen protector for LCD screen, beautiful Nikon bag, memory card holder for extra cards, good 2x telephoto lens for long distance objects.We're still exploring camera's cool features, it'll take a while until we master all them, it's been a dream owing this camera, takes awesome pics even when is out of focus... :)Photos in Jpeg format are very nice; in RAW format they are crispy clear (great to be manipulated in Lightroom), even though they take more space in the memory card.I missed super-moon, but I'm waiting for next clear night to take pic of the moon w/ 55-300 and 2x telephoto lens on tripod, without UV lens, then try on couple of adjustments (found tips on youtube videos), and see how the pics will come out. It should be better than the traditional 'light bulb' pic that our old Kodak takes.Overall, we're very happy with this purchase. D5100 is easy to use (for beginners: leave in Auto mode, camera will do the rest), feels nice (not too heavy for girls), has good grip (doesn't feel like it's going to slide off your hands), and the bundle complements the camera for a smooth and delightful experience, worth every penny invested.Note: if you tend to misplace/lose lens' caps, don't forget to buy couple of 'leashes'.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera - Excellent value!
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I've taken over 100 pictures with my D5100 since I purchased it, and cannot be more satisfied. The kit included two excellent lenses that are absolutely flawless. There were also extra lenses that are meant to attach to the factory Nikon lenses, but I haven't done much with them at this point, as the included lenses do what I need them to do!Additionally, the tripod is very nice, and exceptionally rugged. I love that it has an included carry case, and that makes toting it along with me on the trails much easier.Compared to the D7000, the 5100 holds it's own! With the same sensor, it can shoot just as well as the 7000. It's missing a number of the prosumer features of the 7000, but at roughly $300 less it's more than worth the money.My only complaint is that the included bag is just a little small and cannot carry much more than the items that come with the kit. If you have even one more lens, it probably isn't going to fit in there... unless it's a 50mm prime focus! That one you just might squeeze in!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: TX Coach
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera set up when we were moving from Texas to Alaska.  We planned on driving and wanted to make a summer vacation out of the move.  The drive was incredible, Alaska has been incredible and this camera has done an outstanding job of capturing all of it.  I haven’t found that I need anything other than what came in the kit as of yet and I don’t really see outgrowing the camera but who knows I might add another lens or something at some point.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I still think it was a little over priced.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera choice
Reviews.Author: Julio Stirling
Reviews.Content: My wife was delighted with this present! It maybe have more accessories than needed, but it is a great set.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA KIT
Reviews.Author: Lisa J. Giovino
Reviews.Content: It is totally awesome !!! I love it.  It was good.  There were a few things that were not great.  The remote would not work but I guess those are the breaks.  :(

Reviews.Title: good solid camera
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: really didn't want, nor use, most of the stuff other than the camera and lenses.  it was a pretty decent deal, though.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 5100 Rocks.
Reviews.Author: Santhosh
Reviews.Content: Great Package! Excellent product from Nikon. I am not using all these kits but it might come in handy at times.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the product. Recieved it sooner than expected. I would have given it a 5 star except for the tripod made by precision was junk. It broke the first time I tried to use it. I have not used all of the other accesories but I llike everything about the camera, bag, filters and 55mm-300mm lens.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: great packaging. lots of nice accessories with the kit. this camera takes beautiful pictures. I would not recommend this to someone who has never used a dslr.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Jinhua Huang "Huang"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the D5100 bundle with a 18-55mm and a 55-300mm lenses in June 2012 on Amazon from a company called Cameta Camera for $1020. I have taken about 3500 pictures using mostly the 18-55mm lens 80% of time during last few months. The pictures were great. However, during my last trip to the Mammoth Cave, the 18-55mm lens stopped zooming, i.e. the lens got stuck and can only move between 24 and 35mm. Upon close examination after I came out of the cave, I found that the front part of the lens became loose and is wobbling within the outer cylinder. After I manually wiggled it a bit, I can again move between 18 to 55mm. It continues to take pictures. Not sure how long it will last before it falls apart.Perhaps, I had a bad luck and got a bad lens. However, I've expected better quality than this from Nikon. This is a brand new camera and lens with very limited casual use. I'm very disappointed. That's why I'm giving it a 2 star.

Reviews.Title: Super deal, awsome camera!
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Still learning the functions - this is not a point and shoot camera;  the auto functions work well and take great pictures, but I am sure we will get much more out of it as we learn how to use it...

Reviews.Title: Quality of the body
Reviews.Author: Amir
Reviews.Content: Although the technology of this model of Camera and its technical specifications  is excellent, compare to the older models, the quality of the body is poor, or at leadt I prefer the quality of the older model's body than the present ones.

Reviews.Title: My daugther is very Happy :) :) :)
Reviews.Author: Mario Rivera
Reviews.Content: Very good package for this type of products.Camera and accessories included gave her material necessary to have nice experience taken picturesIt exceeded all the expectations!!!Thanks

Reviews.Title: this kit has several things to comment
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: the camera and lenses as all nikon brand is very good, the rest of accesories of the kit are not so good, for example the tripod is so light for the weight of the camera, remote control never worked and the telephoto and wide angle lens, I never got, my money was back but I had to buy the items left in other store

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera
Reviews.Author: Anand Rathi
Reviews.Content: I was determined to buy a Nikon and was set on the 5100. I like the camera, takes very nice pictures. However I am not very sure whether all the accessories are worth it, unless some one can put use to. I would recommend to buy to the camera and buy only those accessories which you think you can use.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: S. Simensky
Reviews.Content: Great combo of stuff for a reasonable price.  Now I gotta learn how to use it all.  No complaints thus far.

Reviews.Title: VFM ...!!!
Reviews.Author: Vittala
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer !!! was looking  for some DSLR camera package(not sure which camera to buy).  Found this package in amazon.com (Nikon d5100, with 18-55mm and 55-300 mm lens, 32GB SD card, UV filters, wide angle and telephoto lenses) and compared price with Best Buy, Fry's and Costco, Costco was providing the camera and 2 lenses specified above + bag and 8 GB SD Card for $899 but no filters tripods, wide angle and telephoto lenses.  This is a good package and received the ordered item on-time.

Reviews.Title: Nicon D5100
Reviews.Author: Curtis Miles
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding deal based on everything included in the bundle. The camera takes very good pictures and is easy to use. the only down side is that not everything fits into the bag.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pics
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: Great camera, beautiful pics this camera was recommended to me and I  would recommend this to others to be the camera to buy..

Reviews.Title: Great Package for Cheap
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: Camera is great and the price for it and all the accessories was very low.Thank you and have a good day.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Rock
Reviews.Content: I love this package.  I use this all the time and look forward to taking long range photos with the zoom lenses.  I looked hard for this package locally, but couldn't find anything close.  Arrived promptly as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Hyacinth Uzoma
Reviews.Content: Although I am still learning how to use this camera, so far it has produced excellent pictures.Because I am still very much on the steep part of the learning curve, I feel frustrated not understanding how to shoot pictures rapidly and in quick succession. Also, the zoom function is a bit on the high side. In a crowded scenario where everyone is striving to take pictures of a group, this camera puts the owner at a disadvantage because you will need to stay farther from the crowd to get everyone in the group in the picture and meanwhile other photographers will be standing in your way and preventing this camera from getting the real picture!Nonetheless, I will still recommend this camera to my friends.
